changeSet.author: platform
changeSet.comment: Relax overly restrictive default policies: clear allow_roles when it exactly equals DEPT default triple
changeSet.sql: UPDATE catalog_access_policy p SET allow_roles = NULL FROM catalog_dataset d WHERE p.dataset_id = d.id AND UPPER(COALESCE(d.scope,'')) = 'DEPT' AND regexp_replace(COALESCE(p.allow_roles,''),'\s','', 'g') IN ( 'ROLE_DEPT_DATA_VIEWER,ROLE_DEPT_DATA_DEV,ROLE_DEPT_DATA_OWNER', 'ROLE_DEPT_DATA_VIEWER,ROLE_DEPT_DATA_OWNER,ROLE_DEPT_DATA_DEV', 'ROLE_DEPT_DATA_DEV,ROLE_DEPT_DATA_VIEWER,ROLE_DEPT_DATA_OWNER', 'ROLE_DEPT_DATA_DEV,ROLE_DEPT_DATA_OWNER,ROLE_DEPT_DATA_VIEWER', 'ROLE_DEPT_DATA_OWNER,ROLE_DEPT_DATA_VIEWER,ROLE_DEPT_DATA_DEV', 'ROLE_DEPT_DATA_OWNER,ROLE_DEPT_DATA_DEV,ROLE_DEPT_DATA_VIEWER' );
